subject: Pro plus
description_text:
Hello I'm trying to calibrate my pro plus pedals and it's not working
correctly. I'm pressing the throttle all the way down but it's only
registering about 40% in the simsonn app. Any ideas on how to fix this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Waldner,  This is normal; you just need to recalibrate the pedals.Â
